object.name: blackberry.accelerometer.Orientation
object.comment: Contains constants for the six possible device orientations sensed by the accelerometer sensor.
object.details: The Orientation object contains constants for all the possible orientations supported by the accelerometer. One of these values will populate the blackberry.accelerometer.orientation field.

const.name: UNKNOWN
const.comment: Orientation constant indicating an unknown BlackBerry device orientation.

const.name: G_FORCE_VALUE
const.comment: Constant for raw acceleration value that is equal to G-Force.

const.name: BACK_UP
const.comment: Orientation constant indicating the BlackBerry device display is directly facing the ground.

const.name: BOTTOM_UP
const.comment: Orientation constant indicating the bottom side of the Blackberry device is moving upwards.

const.name: FRONT_UP
const.comment: Orientation constant indicating the BlackBerry device display is facing 180 degrees from the ground.

const.name: LEFT_UP
const.comment: Orientation constant indicating the left side of the BlackBerry device is moving upwards.

const.name: RIGHT_UP
const.comment: Orientation constant indicating the right side of the BlackBerry device is moving upwards.

const.name: TOP_UP
const.comment: Orientation constant indicating the top side of the Blackberry device is moving upwards.
